healthy. You need to eat

• Try to space visitors out 
and say no to visitors if 
you feel too tired or need 
some time with your baby.
• Too many visitors in a 
short time can be very 
tiring. If visitors do come, 
don’t feel you have to tidy 
up or lay on a meal. Let 
them do things for you, like 
the washing up, making 
a meal or bringing some 
groceries.
